'''''-on''''' is a masculine suffix in [[Quenya]].<ref>
{{NM|Galadriel}}, p.353</ref>

==Examples==
*''[[Sauron]]'' (''saura'' = "foul") <ref> {{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1170395945.html?neo|articlename=Q. Sauron |website=Eldamo|accessed=17 May 2025}}</ref>
*''[[Ancalimon]]'' (''ancalima'' = "most bright")<ref> {{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1254790427.html?neo|articlename=Q. Ancalimon |website=Eldamo|accessed=17 May 2025}}</ref>
